cmd:
volume="/mnt/onedata"

if mount|grep $volume; then
    oneclient -u /mnt/onedata
else
    mkdir -p /mnt/onedata
fi

while true; do

if mount|grep $volume; then
    echo "oneclient already mounted"
else
    oneclient /mnt/onedata --insecure -i -o allow_other  --force-direct-io --monitoring-type graphite --monitoring-level-full --monitoring-period 5 --graphite-url tcp://192.168.51.95:2003 --graphite-namespace-prefix oneclient-`hostname | cut -f1 -d.` --force-fullblock-read
    echo "oneclient mounted"
fi
sleep 60
done
